name: Water and Justice
title: Dance of Justice
desc: "'Existence' was Egeria's justice... and to me, justice is the 'continuation' of that existence."

skills.desc: Distributes the HP of all your undefeated characters equally, and then heals all of them for 1 HP. (You must have at least 2 Fontaine characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
